title: Takeshi Kanazawa
text: Takeshi Kanazawa (金澤 岳, born May 5, 1984 in <a href="Tondabayashi">Tondabayashi</a>), nicknamed "Kin", is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> former professional <a href="baseball">baseball</a> <a href="catcher">catcher</a> in <a href="Japan">Japan</a>'s <a href="Nippon%20Professional%20Baseball">Nippon Professional Baseball</a>. He played for the <a href="Chiba%20Lotte%20Marines">Chiba Lotte Marines</a> from 2008 to 2014 and from 2016 to 2018.
